replies.body:
Here's my combination. I don't have a lot of money, so I used it for the best.

Keyboard: Lenovo KU-1153
Description: Great feel, light keys for fast typing speed, comfortable.

Mouse: E-3lue EMS109BK Gaming Mouse
Description: Fast clicking speed, nice feel,

If you want the best and have a lot of money, get these.

Keyboard: CM Storm Devastater

Mouse: Logitech G502 Proteus Core

replies.body:
Not going to lie.

Razer is for try hard kids.

There SOOO many other better options but they don't do their research.

replies.body:
Not going to lie, you're wrong.

Razer makes Decent gaming keyboards and really good Mice..

Personally the Deathadder is their best mouse... Pretty sure it out rivals other mice, such as the Steel Series Rival (XDDDD) and other gaming mice.

Keyboard... Ehh, Sure

But I spilled multiple drinks on my keyboard (On accident) It hasn't any problems what so ever... But tbh, Corsair and Logitech make better keyboards...
